div.span: This module provides the functionality of defining and managing supported participants types, However all types can be distinctively defined by relating each type to its profile details, Through this module the system provides ability to add new participants and maintaining their information such as (ID, IBAN, BIC, message type participant type, debit and credit limits).

td.p: The participant type, which can be direct, indirect, sub-direct, or a technical agent
- Direct: Disable both Settling and Communicating Participants and set them optional
- Indirect: Disable Settling and set it as optional and Enable Communicating and set it as required
- Technical: Disable Communicating and set it as optional and Enable Settling and set it as required
- Sub-Direct: Enable both Settling and Communicating Participants and set them as required
The settling participant of a technical or a sub-direct participant
The communicating participant of an indirect or a sub-direct participant
The institution type of the participant
The phone number of the participant
The email address of the participant
A flag indicating whether the participant is suspended from sending messages or not
A flag indicating whether the participant is suspended from receiving messages or not
A flag indicating whether the participant is Defaulted or not
A flag indicating whether the participant is Terminated or not
A flag indicating whether to charge exclusion on the participant or apply predefined charges
Assign one of defined limits profiles to the Participant
